28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Asma' bint 'Umaish said:" I said: 'O Messenger of Allah (S.A.W)! Some of Ja'far's children have suffered from an accelerated case of the inflammation of the eye, so should I have them treated with Ruqyah?' He said: 'Yes,for indeed if there was anything that could overcome the Decree, then the evil eye would overcome it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّقْيَةِ مِنَ الْعَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Performing Ruqyah For The (Evil) Eye
